subject: Re: [junit] Re: Using JMock, example of the after() MatchBuilder?
msgSnippet: ...  Send this to the jMock folks. Try joining the jmock-user mailing list, as well. They /know/ that documentation is slight and they d love to do
messageBody:
cliftonccraig wrote:

> J.B.

<snip />

Send this to the jMock folks. Try joining the jmock-user mailing list,
as well. They /know/ that documentation is slight and they'd love to do
better, but there's Too Much to Do. This might help them.
